#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int f(int n)
{
    return n-(n+1)/2+1;
}
int main()
{
    std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        if(n==0 || m==0)
            cout<<0<<"\n";
        else
            cout<<f(n)+f(m)-1<<"\n";
    }
}
